# PR Summary

Respect `TERM` env var where:

`dumb` set SupportsVirtualTerminal = false
`xterm-mono` set $PSStyle.OutputRendering = PlainText
`xtermm` set $PSStyle.OutputRendering = PlainText

if `$env:NO_COLOR` exists, set $PSStyle.OutputRendering = PlainText

Note that if you try this interactively, PSReadLine doesn't respect these two values so on screen output will be hard to read as it still emits colors and cursor movements.  Created https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/2277 to track this.

## PR Context

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/14964
Fix #16059
